metadata.name: Mount Execution With Hidepid Parameter
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the "mount" command with "hidepid" parameter to make invisible processes to other users from the system

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/mount')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hidepid=2')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -o ')))

output.summary: Detects execution of the "mount" command with "hidepid" parameter to make invisible processes to other users from the system
